page.title: 14Biddestone & Hartham W.I.
page.content: The Women's Institute meets each month in the school.Meetings begin with business comprising mainly notices of forthcoming events and projects at local,group,county and national levels.(Members join in county events including tennis and skittles). This is followed by a social time during which light refreshments are served by members on a rota basis. Finally the invited speaker entertains and/or informs on subjects varying from wholemeal cookery to hypnotherapy, folk songs to Cancer Research. Outings to places of interest are organised as are cake and produce stalls to raise money for W.I. funds. Members also raise village funds by organising teas for visitors to the annual Village Fete. A mystery coach tour followed a tea prepared by members is given annually for senior citizens.
